name: Song Lyrics Quiz | Lyrics Mixture | 10 Questions

questions.text: "Street's like a jungle, so call the police. Following the herd to be free."
questions.explanation:
Girls and Boys.

	Blur sings this song.  It is on the album "The Best of Blur".

questions.text: "Somebody once told me the world is gonna roll me. I ain't the sharpest tool in the shed."
questions.explanation:
All Star.

	Smash Mouth sings this song.  It is on the "NOW 3" album.

questions.text: "You can bicker, you can talk, you can bicker, you can talk.  Bicker, bicker, bicker, talk talk, talk."
questions.explanation:
Rock Island.

	This song is from the show "The Music Man".  It's the first song in the show.

questions.text: "Then I turned on the TV. And that's about the time she walked away from me."
questions.explanation:
What's My Age Again?.

	Blink-182 sings this song.  It is on the "NOW 3" album.

questions.text: "Seeing the way you're acting like someone else gets me frustrated. You crawl, then you fall."
questions.explanation:
Complicated.

	Avril Lavigne sings this song.  It is on her album called "Let Go".

questions.text: "You touch got me looking so crazy right now. Your kiss can only save me right now."
questions.explanation:
Crazy In Love.

	Beyonce sings this song.  It features Jay-Z.  It is on her album "Dangerously In Love".

questions.text: "Take a crazy chance. Do a crazy dance."
questions.explanation:
Why Not.

	Hilary Duff sings this song.  It is on the "Kid Pick Hit Mix" album.

questions.text: "Oh the buzzing of the bees in the bubblegum trees and the soda water fountain. The lemonade springs where the bluebird sings."
questions.explanation:
The Big Rock Candy Mountain.

	Tom Chapin sings this song.  It is on his album "Great Big Fun".

questions.text: "I don't wanna be a fool for you. Just another player in your game for two."
questions.explanation:
Bye Bye Bye.

	'NSync sings this song.  It is on the "NOW 6" album.

All the Small Things.

	Blink-182 sings this song.  It is on the "NOW 4" album.
